# Output: AI Viability Report

A structured, human-readable report containing:

## Executive Summary

- Case type and category

- Predicted likelihood of success (expressed as a percentage and confidence interval)

- Go / No-Go recommendation

- Brief justification summary

## Detailed Analysis

- Key legal issues detected

- Mapping of facts to relevant statutes, articles, or precedents

- Identified missing or weak evidence

- Sentiment and credibility analysis (optional)

## Strength Assessment
